doc:
Kimberlin Brown https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kimberlin_Brown 0 Kimberlin Brown Pelzer (born June 29, 1961) is an American actress best known for her role as Sheila Carter in The Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful between 1990 and 2018. Kimberlin_Brown_Pelzer ( born June_29_,_1961 ) is an_American_actress best_known for her_role as Sheila_Carter in The_Young and the_Restless and The_Bold and the_Beautiful between 1990_and_2018 .
